summary: This document is a summary of Jeffrey Epstein's account activity at Deutsche Bank for the month of April 2018. It details transactions including deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, revealing significant financial movements and balances throughout the month.

events.title: Account Summary for April 2018
events.description: This document summarizes the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank for the month of April 2018, detailing various transactions.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtr, B3, Saint Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's account had a beginning balance of $2,018,323.09 on April 1, 2018.
The account experienced significant transactions, including multiple outgoing transfers and payments to various entities.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2018, was $3,851,284.16.
Several payments were made to attorneys Matthew A. Goldberger and Martin G. Weinberg from Epstein's account.
There are multiple mentions of preauthorized debits and outgoing money transfers throughout the month.
